item.title: Installing a newer version of gdal on Ubuntu 20.04
item.description: The installation candidate for GDAL for Ubuntu 20.04 is quite old. The mapviews team has come up with some rather good new features that rely on v3.3.1 or newer. First, use the PPA from ubuntugis-unstable: sudo add-apt-repository ppa:ubuntugis/ubuntugis-unstable # enter sudo apt-get update You must purge existing versions of gdal-bin, libkml, and libgdal on your machine. Note that your version numbers may vary (libgdal29, for example, may be something else)
